name: Alpha Werewolf
des: Eat a villager each night. Only alpha werewolf can choose victim. Click on avatar of user who you want to choose (Except youself)

name: Aura Seer
des: At night, find out if someone has a non-ordinary role and what it is. Click on avatar of user who you want to choose (Except youself)

name: Witch
des: Kill or heal a player, once each per game. Click on avatar of user who you want to choose (Except youself)

name: Bodyguard
des: Choose a different player each night to protect. That player cannot be killed that night. Click on avatar of user who you want to choose

name: Hunter
des: If you are killed, take someone down with you. Click on avatar of user who you want to choose (Except youself)

name: Villager
des: The Villagers are a team seeking to kill all of the Werewolves. A Villager is a player character with no abilities, but the Village also includes any role not on the same team of the Werewolves, like the Guard, the Seer, the Witch, and others.
